description: Application for a Non Material Amendment (S96a), changes to cycle storage location, minor changes to fenestration and rooflights, siting of annex away from side boundary, additional PV panels and omission of rooflights, alteration annex glazing configuration,   provision of rear garden planters, decorative entrance path re-instated, minor relocation of bin store, and reinstatement of front boundary wall in relation to planning permission 223264HH dated 16.12.2022 for 'Single storey side and rear wrap around extension, following removal of ground floor side bay window; mansard roof extension to rear (main) roofslope; rear roof extension to rear outrigger roofslope incorporating four dormer windows to rear and side roofslopes; associated internal and external alterations, involving installation of additional windows to side elevation; and single storey detached garden outbuilding for use as an office'
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers:
102 - Proposed First Floor Plan - Rev H
105 - Proposed Annex Floor Plan - Rev H
106 - Proposed Refuse & Recycling Plan - Rev H
201 - Proposed Front & Rear Elevations - Rev H
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning
